version_description:
• IMPROVED CHAT: We made it easier for you to interact with other players without leaving the table.
• HAND HISTORY: Never miss a beat! Review the chat log anytime if you missed a winning hand.
• NEW FRIEND BONUS: Invite friends to play WSOP and get FREE CHIPS when they grab a seat.
• EXPRESS YOURSELF: Chat in Russian, Turkish, Greek & Ukrainian.
• RING DISPLAY: Now you can show off limited time Tournament rings in your profile

• IMPROVED CHAT: We made it easier for you to interact with other players without leaving the table.
• HAND HISTORY: Never miss a beat! Review the chat log anytime if you missed a winning hand.
• NEW FRIEND BONUS: Invite friends to play WSOP and get FREE CHIPS when they grab a seat.
• EXPRESS YOURSELF: Chat in Russian, Turkish, Greek & Ukrainian.
• RING DISPLAY: Now you can show off limited time Tournament rings in your profile

• IMPROVED CHAT: We made it easier for you to interact with other players without leaving the table.
• HAND HISTORY: Never miss a beat! Review the chat log anytime if you missed a winning hand.
• NEW FRIEND BONUS: Invite friends to play WSOP and get FREE CHIPS when they grab a seat.
• EXPRESS YOURSELF: Chat in Russian, Turkish, Greek & Ukrainian.
• RING DISPLAY: Now you can show off limited time Tournament rings in your profile

Light update for you poker sharks today:
• New ways to share free chips with your friends!
• We've folded more bugs to keep your poker experience better than ever!

Good luck at the tables. Don't forget to like our Facebook page and follow us on Twitter.

• Ultimate Betting Control – Take precise control of your bets with the improved 'Raise Bar'.
• Thrilling New Events – Ground-breaking new events are coming soon to a table near you.
• Refreshed Design – WSOP is sharper than ever.
• We’ve folded more bugs to improve your WSOP experience.

• Ultimate Betting Control – Take precise control of your bets with the improved 'Raise Bar'.
• Thrilling New Events – Ground-breaking new events are coming soon to a table near you.
• Refreshed Design – WSOP is sharper than ever.
• We’ve folded more bugs to improve your WSOP experience.

• Ultimate Betting Control – Take precise control of your bets with the improved 'Raise Bar'.
• Thrilling New Events – Ground-breaking new events are coming soon to a table near you.
• Refreshed Design – WSOP is sharper than ever.
• We’ve folded more bugs to improve your WSOP experience.

• INTRODUCING: WSOP Bracelets & Collectors’ Chips – Become a champion by winning the ultimate prize in poker, a WSOP Bracelet. Solidify your place in poker history by filling up your new Collections & earning your Bracelet. Do you have what it takes to become a poker legend?
• All Gifts at Once – You asked for it, here it is. Collect all your gifts in one click!

• INTRODUCING: WSOP Bracelets & Collectors’ Chips – Become a champion by winning the ultimate prize in poker, a WSOP Bracelet. Solidify your place in poker history by filling up your new Collections & earning your Bracelet. Do you have what it takes to become a poker legend?
• All Gifts at Once – You asked for it, here it is. Collect all your gifts in one click!

• INTRODUCING: WSOP Bracelets & Collectors’ Chips – Become a champion by winning the ultimate prize in poker, a WSOP Bracelet. Solidify your place in poker history by filling up your new Collections & earning your Bracelet. Do you have what it takes to become a poker legend?
• All Gifts at Once – You asked for it, here it is. Collect all your gifts in one click!

● NEW Momentum Event – A new way for you to earn Bracelets faster. Coming soon!
● Holiday Treats – Come back daily for surprises throughout the holiday season.
● Active Effects – Check out all of your active boosts with just one click!
